August 19, 2011, Samuel worked with Veronica in the same group

Samuel Opp is intelligent, resourceful and dedicated, as he showed time and again working for KJACK Radio. The work at KJACK is labor intensive and can require long hours and lots of effort for not a lot of results. Yet Sam was there day and night working toward making the station run more efficiently and to smooth out any problems that popped up. He was proficient with the equipment, understood the ins-and-outs of radio management and production and could be counted on to do what was required for the station, sometimes at his own inconvenience. Samuel was also a reliable director and worked well guiding and training new staff, as well as providing support and leadership to his colleagues and peers. He would be a benefit and superb addition to any company he works for, in any position he is in, because he brings dedication, innovation, reliability and a great attitude to anything he does. Sincerely, Veronica Figueroa
